page.title: 19LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: THE SURVEY AREA IS ADMINISTERED BY THREE LOCAL PARISH COUNCILS - MARAZION,ST.HILARY AND PERRANUTHNOE - ST.HILARY BEING THE LARGEST PARISH. GOLDSITHNEY COMES WITHIN THE PARISH OF PERRANUTHNOE. {PENWITH DISTRICT COUNCIL}EXERCISES AN OVERIDING AUTHORITY OVER THE AREA AND PROVIDES MOST OF THE SERVICES. THE PARISH COUNCILS HAVE REPRESENTATION ON THE PENWITH COUNCIL, WHO IN TURN APPOINT TO THE COUNTY COUNCIL AT TRURO. MOST OF THE LOCAL PARISH COUNCILS' WORK IS CONCERNED WITH FOOTPATHS AND PLANNING APPLICATIONS.
